channel.title: 2024 PAX West on Exo Archive
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 PAX West on Exo Archive

item.description:
Kirb your enthusiasm

HINT: Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.      

HINT: Inhale, exorcise      

ANSWER: Ghost Kirby
item.content:
Kirb your enthusiasm

HINT: Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.      

HINT: Inhale, exorcise      

ANSWER: Ghost Kirby

item.description:
Perhaps some espresso could cure this.

HINT: Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.      

ANSWER: Depresso
item.content:
Perhaps some espresso could cure this.

HINT: Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.      

ANSWER: Depresso

item.description:
His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days.

ANSWER: Olimar
item.content:
His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days.

ANSWER: Olimar

item.description:
Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders.

HINT: _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl      

HINT: 🍌      

ANSWER: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble
item.content:
Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders.

HINT: _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl      

HINT: 🍌      

ANSWER: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble

item.description:
He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage.

HINT: His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.      

ANSWER: Remy
item.content:
He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage.

HINT: His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.      

ANSWER: Remy

item.title: Sidequest 01: Hotel Name
item.description:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: El Rancho
item.content:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: El Rancho

item.description:
They coexist with humans! Uh you gotta go less fast… NO they don’t. Yea, actually they do.

HINT: Well that escalated… at the speed of sound.      

ANSWER: Sonic in Jurassic Park
item.content:
They coexist with humans! Uh you gotta go less fast… NO they don’t. Yea, actually they do.

HINT: Well that escalated… at the speed of sound.      

ANSWER: Sonic in Jurassic Park

item.description:
HINT: Believe it or not, PAX wasn’t made by game developers.      

HINT: Well Actually… Jerry and Mike did technically end up designing a game with Hothead and Zeboyd. :nerd:      

ANSWER: Yoshi
item.content:
HINT: Believe it or not, PAX wasn’t made by game developers.      

HINT: Well Actually… Jerry and Mike did technically end up designing a game with Hothead and Zeboyd. :nerd:      

ANSWER: Yoshi

item.description:
Same yellow shirt. Same annoying voice. Same Know-It-All. Different Platform.

HINT: Do you know what kind of train this is? Well, do you?      

HINT: ðŸ»â€â„ï¸ ðŸš† ðŸ’¨      

ANSWER: The Polar Express
item.content:
Same yellow shirt. Same annoying voice. Same Know-It-All. Different Platform.

HINT: Do you know what kind of train this is? Well, do you?      

HINT: ðŸ»â€â„ï¸ ðŸš† ðŸ’¨      

ANSWER: The Polar Express

item.description:
Everlasting and ancient, but do you even have a drop of knowledge about its history? If so, that could Quel’ your thirst.

HINT: Actually a… .      

HINT: Sometimes being subversively literal is funny. The answer is so obvious, it will leave you saying wow.      

ANSWER: Well of Eternity
item.content:
Everlasting and ancient, but do you even have a drop of knowledge about its history? If so, that could Quel’ your thirst.

HINT: Actually a… .      

HINT: Sometimes being subversively literal is funny. The answer is so obvious, it will leave you saying wow.      

ANSWER: Well of Eternity

item.description:
“Every Key to this puzzle is logically sound. And I will quietly die on this hill.”

HINT: Actually, it is literally sound.      

HINT: That’s not the type of key I was expecting.      

ANSWER: Piano Puzzle
item.content:
“Every Key to this puzzle is logically sound. And I will quietly die on this hill.”

HINT: Actually, it is literally sound.

F.A.A.A.B.C.D.H.M.R.S.T.V.

(It’s in Summit)

item.description: ANSWER: Necromancy of Thay
item.content: ANSWER: Necromancy of Thay

item.description:
Its consumable is so bomb, you know it’s made by dark magic. Maybe even the devil herself.

HINT: Usually it’s the blast that gets ya, but this miasma is nasty!      

HINT: Corpses have been used like this for generations, but the 4th gen chefs put a dark and deadly twist on it this time.      

ANSWER: Blighted Corpse Explosion
item.content:
Its consumable is so bomb, you know it’s made by dark magic. Maybe even the devil herself.

HINT: Usually it’s the blast that gets ya, but this miasma is nasty!      

HINT: Corpses have been used like this for generations, but the 4th gen chefs put a dark and deadly twist on it this time.      

ANSWER: Blighted Corpse Explosion

item.description:
He can equip the book, but no need just let him cook. An expert of consumption, you know he’ll have you hooked.

HINT: Using coins to unlock this hint, is an absolute abomination.      

HINT: 2003 to now, he is ironically unchanged.      

ANSWER: Pudge
item.content:
He can equip the book, but no need just let him cook. An expert of consumption, you know he’ll have you hooked.

HINT: Using coins to unlock this hint, is an absolute abomination.      

HINT: 2003 to now, he is ironically unchanged.      

ANSWER: Pudge

item.description:
I am already chained up, freedom? No thanks. Hit me and I’m yours. Corpse + _____ = Success.

FREE HINT: With gentle hands and a heart of a fighter I’m a Survivor.      

ANSWER: Zombie Juice
item.content:
I am already chained up, freedom? No thanks. Hit me and I’m yours. Corpse + _____ = Success.

FREE HINT: With gentle hands and a heart of a fighter I’m a Survivor.      

ANSWER: Zombie Juice

item.description:
Redacted, Australia, PAX Online, Minion_00143, 11:01

HINT: Socially distanced, but not unseen.      

HINT: VOD Review!      

ANSWER: Rotten Flesh
item.content:
Redacted, Australia, PAX Online, Minion_00143, 11:01

item.title: Sidequest 03: Dragon Fource
item.description:
Whether happy, angry, silly or sad. You must face the dragon fource.

HINT: Exterior

Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: Palraiyuk
item.content:
Whether happy, angry, silly or sad. You must face the dragon fource.

HINT: Exterior

Rewards

  • Soul Coins: 0

item.description:
Assassin’s Croak

HINT: Assassin’s Hop      

ANSWER: Bullfrog
item.content:
Assassin’s Croak

HINT: Assassin’s Hop      

ANSWER: Bullfrog

item.description:
What, shrimp? You really think you can be some sort of rockstar? You’re lucky if you become anything more than a car thief.

ANSWER: Bully
item.content:
What, shrimp? You really think you can be some sort of rockstar? You’re lucky if you become anything more than a car thief.

ANSWER: Bully

item.description:
Dog? No, this isn’t the time fo… WTF is that?

FREE HINT: Nina is all grown up, Edward not fwend. You Died.      

HINT: The moves of a top tier festival showmen, and the ferocity of a chimera.      

ANSWER: Divine Beast Dancing Lion
item.content:
Dog? No, this isn’t the time fo… WTF is that?

FREE HINT: Nina is all grown up, Edward not fwend. You Died.      

HINT: The moves of a top tier festival showmen, and the ferocity of a chimera.      

ANSWER: Divine Beast Dancing Lion

item.description: ANSWER: Bioshock
item.content: ANSWER: Bioshock

item.description:
BREAKING NEWS: Game criticized for not playing itself. You’ll never Astral Ascend with inactive “play”

ANSWER: Idle Slayer
item.content:
BREAKING NEWS: Game criticized for not playing itself. You’ll never Astral Ascend with inactive “play”

ANSWER: Idle Slayer

item.description:
_____ Vs _____, Wait… Are we the bad guys Riot? Dr. Exo?

ANSWER: Mechs Vs Minions
item.content:
_____ Vs _____, Wait… Are we the bad guys Riot? Dr. Exo?

ANSWER: Mechs Vs Minions

item.title: Sidequest 04: Love Letter
item.description:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: Pearl
item.content:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: Pearl

item.description:
You know this. No other team can help you answer this better than yourself.

HINT: Don’t overthink this, look in my eyes.      

HINT: Be less humble.      

ANSWER: [your team’s name]
item.content:
You know this. No other team can help you answer this better than yourself.

HINT: Don’t overthink this, look in my eyes.      

HINT: Be less humble.      

ANSWER: [your team’s name]

item.description:
Cool guys don’t look at explosions, LEGENDARY guys drive through them.

HINT: Caused by an angelic code.      

HINT: The stores were absolutely Flooded by fans to reach this moment.      

HINT: Ride the land mammal Forward Unto Dawn.      

ANSWER: Warthog Run
item.content:
Cool guys don’t look at explosions, LEGENDARY guys drive through them.

HINT: Caused by an angelic code.      

HINT: The stores were absolutely Flooded by fans to reach this moment.      

HINT: Ride the land mammal Forward Unto Dawn.      

ANSWER: Warthog Run

item.description:
Now mostly nostalgic, but a powerhouse of joy that stood strong once upon a time. I can still hear it clear as day.

HINT: Pre If i could Cast spells, I would enchant you with Dreams of a simpler time.      

ANSWER: Sega
item.content:
Now mostly nostalgic, but a powerhouse of joy that stood strong once upon a time. I can still hear it clear as day.

HINT: Pre If i could Cast spells, I would enchant you with Dreams of a simpler time.      

ANSWER: Sega

item.description:
The wheels of time they echo, your destiny will not let go. You and I express our lives and our worries fade from our falsetto.

HINT: I wear a size 8 wheel.      

HINT: The tension should be cut with a paper knife.      

HINT: They should be less Humble, as this Bundle of joy was a great success.
item.content:
The wheels of time they echo, your destiny will not let go. You and I express our lives and our worries fade from our falsetto.

HINT: I wear a size 8 wheel.      

HINT: The tension should be cut with a paper knife.      

HINT: They should be less Humble, as this Bundle of joy was a great success.      

ANSWER: Wandersong

item.description:
Gilded plumage to fly to a bird’s peak, and friends made along the way.

HINT: Taylor and Sue could play out one of Aesop’s Fables.      

ANSWER: A Short Hike
item.content:
Gilded plumage to fly to a bird’s peak, and friends made along the way.

HINT: Taylor and Sue could play out one of Aesop’s Fables.      

ANSWER: A Short Hike

item.title: Sidequest 05: Not Over There
item.description:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: Right Here
item.content:
Rewards

  • Gears: 1
  • Soul Coins: 0

ANSWER: Right Here

item.description:
PAX

HINT: Not “one of”… THE.      

ANSWER: Power Glove
item.content:
PAX

HINT: Not “one of”… THE.      

ANSWER: Power Glove

item.description:
You have no rights! I can go willy-nilly, hold my gloves.

HINT: I am the OG, no wand or wizardry can suppress me now.      

HINT: No royalties, No Kingdom. You would be like me too. BE AFRAID ha HA!      

HINT: Come hell or high water… Screw it, I’ll give ya both! ha HA! ðŸ­      

ANSWER: Captain Willie
item.content:
You have no rights! I can go willy-nilly, hold my gloves.

HINT: I am the OG, no wand or wizardry can suppress me now.      

HINT: No royalties, No Kingdom. You would be like me too. BE AFRAID ha HA!      

HINT: Come hell or high water… Screw it, I’ll give ya both! ha HA! ðŸ­      

ANSWER: Captain Willie

item.description:
HINT: Said to be inspiration for the rework of arguably one of the most renown videogame villains.      

HINT: It has not always looked exactly like this, you could say it was reborn. Less Kingdom Hearts, more Dark Souls.
item.content:
HINT: Said to be inspiration for the rework of arguably one of the most renown videogame villains.      

HINT: It has not always looked exactly like this, you could say it was reborn. Less Kingdom Hearts, more Dark Souls.      

HINT: This is your Final hint. I will not be making 16.      

ANSWER: Vincent Valentine

item.description:
My hero is an athlete, their abilities are truly transformative. Always on the ball and will fight for me. A true G.

ANSWER: Glover
item.content:
My hero is an athlete, their abilities are truly transformative. Always on the ball and will fight for me. A true G.

ANSWER: Glover

item.description:
Make sure to use it in the courts, otherwise your electronics might short!

HINT: Gloves more commonly known to assist in catching a ball, not many known for creating them.      

HINT: Don’t be a Goob about it.      

HINT: This one doesn’t wreak Havoc like the other.      

ANSWER: Charge Glove
item.content:
Make sure to use it in the courts, otherwise your electronics might short!

HINT: Gloves more commonly known to assist in catching a ball, not many known for creating them.      

HINT: Don’t be a Goob about it.      

HINT: This one doesn’t wreak Havoc like the other.

item.content:

  • Soul Coins: 0

item.description:
Some fans believe he should get more attention in his original medium. He definitely didn’t get a boatload of it in this one.

HINT: Lost in the woods on this one? Broaden your horizons and discover what you might sea.      

HINT: To embark his path on the straight and narrow, might be easier if you follow a Sparrow.      

HINT: Not quite a commander.
item.content:
Some fans believe he should get more attention in his original medium. He definitely didn’t get a boatload of it in this one.

item.description:
This location is the reason Knuckles never left Act 1.

HINT: It’s a gated community.      

ANSWER: Emerald Grove
item.content:
This location is the reason Knuckles never left Act 1.

HINT: It’s a gated community.      

ANSWER: Emerald Grove

item.description:
Define… Grove… And make it rinky.

HINT: Let’s be mature about this answer… Or let’s not, the creator knew what they were doing using 2 euphemisms in one title.      

HINT: 1: Redacted _____ _____ Redacted Redacted.      

ANSWER: Dink Smallwood
item.content:
Define… Grove… And make it rinky.

HINT: Let’s be mature about this answer… Or let’s not, the creator knew what they were doing using 2 euphemisms in one title.      

HINT: 1: Redacted _____ _____ Redacted Redacted.      

ANSWER: Dink Smallwood

Kindergarteners Ought Avoid Labeled Asymmetrical Suits.

item.content:

item.description:
HINT: Can you lend me a hand? I don’t have a leg to stand on.      

ANSWER: Mr. Big
item.content:
HINT: Can you lend me a hand? I don’t have a leg to stand on.      

ANSWER: Mr. Big

item.description:
HINT: The reaper will come for you, even when no one else will.      

ANSWER: Death Stranding 2
item.content:
HINT: The reaper will come for you, even when no one else will.      

ANSWER: Death Stranding 2

item.description:
When all you want to do is fit in, but social practice won’t get you there. And you know there is a clear line to victory. 10 Mil plus or bust.

HINT: He wasn’t kidding around, he made a promise and followed through.      

ANSWER: Alex Thach
item.content:
When all you want to do is fit in, but social practice won’t get you there. And you know there is a clear line to victory. 10 Mil plus or bust.

HINT: He wasn’t kidding around, he made a promise and followed through.

item.description:
HINT: 1st word, 2nd word.      

HINT: War brought you into this world.      

ANSWER: Battle Born
item.content:
HINT: 1st word, 2nd word.      

HINT: War brought you into this world.      

ANSWER: Battle Born

item.description:
No threat of becoming swine, but I haven’t much time. Hero I beg you, give thine graces upon my litter four, by the nine divine.

HINT: Not quite the tale to be expected, from the title which is projected.      

HINT: Hayao’s 2001 vision was a lot more uplifting.      

ANSWER: Elanduya Wirande Soraperil Mendol
item.content:
No threat of becoming swine, but I haven’t much time. Hero I beg you, give thine graces upon my litter four, by the nine divine.

HINT: Not quite the tale to be expected, from the title which is projected.      

HINT: Hayao’s 2001 vision was a lot more uplifting.      

ANSWER: Elanduya Wirande Soraperil Mendol

item.description:
It was anything but soft or small, but for better or for worse… with the UK’s blessing this act of phagocytosis finally concluded.

HINT: End of an era? Or another notch on the belt? Guess it’s a matter of perspective.      

HINT: They join the ranks of others before them such as Mojang and Bethesda.      

ANSWER: Microsoft Acquisition of Activision Blizzard
item.content:
It was anything but soft or small, but for better or for worse… with the UK’s blessing this act of phagocytosis finally concluded.

HINT: End of an era? Or another notch on the belt? Guess it’s a matter of perspective.      

HINT: They join the ranks of others before them such as Mojang and Bethesda.      

ANSWER: Microsoft Acquisition of Activision Blizzard

item.description:
Some announcements are so Legendary they get you tight in the Jeans like Damme!

HINT: Ken, had you in, the first half.      

ANSWER: Street Fighter
item.content:
Some announcements are so Legendary they get you tight in the Jeans like Damme!

HINT: Ken, had you in, the first half.      

ANSWER: Street Fighter

item.description:
Bob: I’m dead tired and sick of watching the same shit, give me the clicker or I’ll make you pay.

HINT: He just doesn’t have the heart to tell you what he’s seen over and over.      

HINT: The discovery of a document was a load off my chest.      

ANSWER: Alan Wake 2
item.content:
Bob: I’m dead tired and sick of watching the same shit, give me the clicker or I’ll make you pay.

item.description:

ANSWER: The Assemblage

item.description:
You aren’t sure how or why… but you feel lesser. Insufficient. Ashamed.

HINT: Click Reserve Items      

ANSWER: Minion of the Month
item.content:
You aren’t sure how or why… but you feel lesser. Insufficient. Ashamed.

HINT: Click Reserve Items      

ANSWER: Minion of the Month

item.description:
Inanimate objects can get tired, which makes sense when that object is essentially you. Great idea…

HINT: It will take a long time to get anywhere, it will be very annoying, but at least it’s pretty?      

HINT: The developer is drowning in a bombardment of harsh reviews.      

HINT: Chill out, harvest a coconut ya damn boat.
item.content:
Inanimate objects can get tired, which makes sense when that object is essentially you. Great idea…

HINT: It will take a long time to get anywhere, it will be very annoying, but at least it’s pretty?      

HINT: The developer is drowning in a bombardment of harsh reviews.      

HINT: Chill out, harvest a coconut ya damn boat.

item.description:

item.content:
The temptation to quit will be greatest just before you are about to succeed, for this Cognitively taxing puzzle. Persist and preserve to obtain what any good completionist deserves.

HINT: Not a soul coin, but it’s commemorative at least. Goes great with that pocket watch and steampunk sci-fi novel.      

HINT: Brushing up on another language or two might get those gears turning.      

HINT: Need more help? Ask the creator, just take a left 6,312 miles from here. That’s where you will find this achievement.      

ANSWER: å¤§æ”¶è—å®¶
